entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -20.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 1:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -20.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -23.2°C
Wind: NW 51 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blizzard developing late this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
